r0      000000
r1      000001
r2      000010
r3      000011
r4      000100
r5      000101
r6      000110
r7      000111
swap    0001
add     0110
iadd    0100
sub     1110
and     0011
or      0101
shl     0000
shr     0000
not     0000101000
inc     0000101010
dec     0000101011
out     0000101100
in      0000110101
nop     0000000010100000
ret     0111111111111111
rti     1011111111111111
hlt     0000000000000000
setc    1111111111111110
clrc    1111111111111101
setn    1111111111111011
clrn    1111111111110111
setz    1111111111101111
clrz    1111111111011111
push    0100
pop     0001
ldm     0010
ldd     1000
std     0110
jz      00000001
